member.name: Windows.IsProcessInIsolatedContainer
member.summary: Determines if a process is running in an isolated container.
member.param: Indicates whether the process is running in an isolated container.
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: Windows.IsProcessInWDAGContainer
member.summary: Determines if a process is running in a Microsoft Defender Application Guard (MDAG) container.
member.param: This parameter is reserved for future use.
This indicates whether the process is running in a MDAG container.
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT success or error code.
